Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgFightLoading10.jpg'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Is this... the space station?'}
{3: 'After passing through countless debris and almost reaching the space station, Watanabe finds it hard to believe what he is seeing.'}
{3: 'The once-white hull is now covered in red growths and spherical structures eerily spread over the entire core module.'}
{3: 'As the transport craft approaches, these structures turn in unison, pointing the remaining white parts at him like curious eyes.'}
{3: 'Whatever those things are, it is clear the space station has been completely ruined and is no longer a human research outpost.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In his peripheral vision, he sees the drifting, lifeless remains in space.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Must rescue the survivors now.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'He moves toward the location he received in the communication.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory110.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've docked. Open the hatch.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Alright, opening the hatch now.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the isolation door opens, three pale faces appear before Watanabe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Are there other survivors?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The one who looks like the leader shakes his head.'}
{2: 'Manager', 3: "We didn't encounter any other survivors. I'm afraid we are the last living souls on the space station.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Are you sure?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Manager', 3: "I'm the head of the research department. My terminal tracks the life signals of all space station employees.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He hands over his terminal on which most of the portraits have turned gray.'}
{2: 'Manager', 3: "Turning gray means one of two things: either they're out of reception range, or their brain activity has ceased.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Upon hearing this, the woman leaning to the side hugs her drone tightly.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Get on board. We need to leave here now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The space station has mutated. Nobody knows what's going to happen next.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{3: "As the transport craft leaves the space station, Watanabe doesn't yet know that someday in the future, he will be involved with this place again."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Manager', 3: 'Where are we going?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The manager asks for the sobbing Jada holding the drone and Philip comforting her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm just on temporary duty. Do you have a contingency plan?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Manager', 3: "What's the situation at the spaceport?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The Starship Fleet went haywire. To destroy the rogue ships, they lost over 70% of their ships.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His grip on the control stick tightens.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jada', 3: 'Then... where can we go?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: 'The spaceport is gone, the starships are gone, and the space station is gone...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: 'How many people are even still alive...', 4: '1'}
{3: "He doesn't have the answer to her question."}
{3: 'All four fell silent. Project Acadia Transfer had completely collapsed under this mishap. After the heavy losses, what has humanity gained?'}
{3: 'In this lonely universe, there will no longer be grand spaceports and starships ready for battle.'}
{3: 'Humanity has taken its first step into the cosmos, only to quickly wither.'}
{3: "And the efforts didn't even make a single ripple in this disaster."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Manager', 3: "Head to Eden II, even though it's just an empty shell now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe changes direction and heads away from Earth...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_08.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'Then, a "Shooting Star" catches his eye.'}
{2: 'Philip', 3: "That's the escape pod, and the spaceport's modular cabin..."}
{2: 'Manager', 3: "And the model is from the space station. We're not the only survivors!"}
{3: 'Each "Shooting Star" represents lives saved.'}
{3: 'His individual efforts might not make much of an impact in this catastrophe, but those who sacrifice are never alone.'}
{3: 'Though the cost was immense, such sacrifices are never in vain.'}
{3: "—The stars are heading toward Eden, humanity's next hope."}
{3: "—Inheriting the will of the fallen, the Shooting Stars will guard humanity's last stronghold."}
{3: "—They are both the walls and the tombstones, silently recording these people's courage and dedication."}
{3: '—Thus, Eden will no longer be an empty shell...'}
{3: '—Babylonia, the spark will be carried into the future.'}
